mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_point (iuser, changed_point, reason) VALUES (${iuser}, ${changed_point}, #{reason})
mapper.select: SELECT ifnull(SUM(result_price), 0) AS result_price, COUNT(iorder) AS cnt FROM t_user A LEFT JOIN t_order B ON A.iuser = B.iuser WHERE A.iuser = ${iuser} GROUP BY A.iuser

SELECT ifnull(result_price, 0) AS result_price, iuser, uid , nm, email, rdt, `point`, recent_rdt, ifnull(recent_price, 0) AS recent_price FROM ( SELECT A.iuser, A.uid, A.nm, A.email, A.rdt, A.`point` , B.rdt AS recent_rdt, B.result_price, recent_price FROM t_user A LEFT JOIN t_order B ON A.iuser = B.iuser LEFT JOIN ( SELECT sum(result_price) AS recent_price, iorder FROM t_order WHERE rdt BETWEEN DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -1 MONTH) AND NOW() GROUP BY iuser ) C ON C.iorder = B.iorder WHERE A.role = 'ROLE_USER' AND (B.order_status != '취소완료' OR B.order_status != '환불완료' OR B.order_status IS NULL)
AND ${type} LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
AND NOT B.rdt IS NULL
ORDER BY A.rdt DESC LIMIT 18446744073709551615 ) P GROUP BY iuser ORDER BY ${sortType} ${sort} LIMIT ${startIdx}, ${recordCount}

SELECT CEIL(COUNT(iuser) / ${recordCount}) AS maxPage FROM ( SELECT A.iuser FROM t_user A LEFT JOIN t_order B ON A.iuser = B.iuser
A.role = 'ROLE_USER'
AND ${type} LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
GROUP BY A.iuser ) AS t

SELECT A.nm, A.uid, A.point, A.email, A.rdt, A.iuser , C.rdt AS recent_rdt, D.recent_price, E.result_price FROM t_user A LEFT JOIN t_order B ON A.iuser = B.iuser LEFT JOIN ( SELECT A.iuser, B.rdt FROM t_user A LEFT JOIN t_order B ON A.iuser = B.iuser WHERE A.iuser = ${iuser} ORDER BY B.rdt DESC LIMIT 1 ) C ON A.iuser = C.iuser LEFT JOIN ( SELECT SUM(result_price) AS recent_price, A.iuser FROM t_user A LEFT JOIN t_order B ON A.iuser = B.iuser WHERE A.iuser = ${iuser} AND B.rdt BETWEEN DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -1 MONTH) AND NOW() ) D ON D.iuser = A.iuser LEFT JOIN ( SELECT SUM(result_price) AS result_price, A.iuser FROM t_user A LEFT JOIN t_order B ON A.iuser = B.iuser WHERE A.iuser = ${iuser} ) E ON A.iuser = E.iuser WHERE A.iuser = ${iuser} GROUP BY A.iuser
SELECT B.post, B.addr, B.addr_detail, B.phone, B.isrep FROM t_user A INNER JOIN t_address B ON A.iuser = B.iuser WHERE A.iuser = ${iuser} AND B.isrep = 'Y'

SELECT B.iorder, B.rdt, B.iuser, B.spent_point, B.payment_way, B.result_price , E.nm, B.order_status, E.iproduct FROM t_user A INNER JOIN t_order B ON A.iuser = B.iuser INNER JOIN t_order_product C ON B.iorder = C.iorder INNER JOIN t_product_detail D ON C.idetail = D.idetail INNER JOIN t_product_master E ON E.iproduct = D.iproduct WHERE A.iuser = ${iuser} ORDER BY B.rdt DESC

SELECT B.ctnt, B.rating, B.rdt, C.iproduct, D.color, C.nm FROM t_user A INNER JOIN t_product_review B ON A.iuser = B.iuser INNER JOIN t_product_master C ON B.iproduct = C.iproduct INNER JOIN t_product_detail D ON C.iproduct = D.iproduct WHERE B.iuser = ${iuser} ORDER BY B.rdt DESC LIMIT ${startIdx}, ${recordCount}

SELECT CEIL(COUNT(B.ireview) / ${recordCount}) as result FROM t_user A INNER JOIN t_product_review B ON A.iuser = B.iuser INNER JOIN t_product_master C ON B.iproduct = C.iproduct INNER JOIN t_product_detail D ON C.iproduct = D.iproduct WHERE B.iuser = ${iuser}

SELECT B.iproduct, B.ctnt, B.parent, B.rdt , C.nm AS productNm, D.color FROM t_user A INNER JOIN t_product_question B ON A.iuser = B.iuser INNER JOIN t_product_master C ON B.iproduct = C.iproduct INNER JOIN t_product_detail D ON D.iproduct = C.iproduct WHERE A.iuser = ${iuser} ORDER BY B.rdt DESC LIMIT ${startIdx}, ${recordCount}
mapper.update: UPDATE t_user a INNER JOIN( SELECT SUM(changed_point) AS cp, iuser FROM t_point WHERE iuser = ${iuser} GROUP BY iuser ) b ON a.iuser = b.iuser SET a.point = b.cp
